QuestData.Title: Someone Setup the Pumpkin Bomb
QuestData.Description: You ever seen one of these?$B$B<Brazie pulls out a pumpkin.>$B$BThis ain't no ordinary pumpkin, friend. See, once you plant it they'll lay in wait until a zombie shows up and then KABLOOEY! Zombie guts all over the place. Let's go!
QuestData.RewardText: D... Do you hear that rumblin'? I think Stillwater is comin'! HOLY MOLY LOOK OUT!
